meanings.definition: A miserly person who is unwilling to spend money.
meanings.sent1: The pinchpenny refused to buy anything that wasn't on sale.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather is known in our family as the pinchpenny who never treats anyone.
meanings.sent3: The pinchpenny brought his own tea bags to the cafe to save a few cents.
meanings.sent4: She was such a pinchpenny that she reused tea bags multiple times.
meanings.sent5: The pinchpenny's wallet was always empty, despite having a good job.

meanings.definition: Stingy or frugal in spending money.
meanings.sent1: The pinchpenny neighbor never contributed to the community fundraisers.
meanings.sent2: My mom is a pinchpenny shopper, always looking for the best deals.
meanings.sent3: The pinchpenny squirrel hoarded nuts in its tree all winter.
meanings.sent4: The pinchpenny clouds held onto their rain, refusing to water the thirsty fields.
meanings.sent5: The pinchpenny student saved every penny for a special trip at the end of the year.
